body_html: I'm assuming you mean that AdamOptimizer is slower than MomentumOptimizer; Adam applies momentum to the whole variable, Momentum only applies it to slices affected. Does tf.contrib.opt.LazyAdamOptimizer work for you?
body_text: I'm assuming you mean that AdamOptimizer is slower than MomentumOptimizer; Adam applies momentum to the whole variable, Momentum only applies it to slices affected. Does tf.contrib.opt.LazyAdamOptimizer work for you?
body: I'm assuming you mean that AdamOptimizer is slower than MomentumOptimizer; Adam applies momentum to the whole variable, Momentum only applies it to slices affected. Does [tf.contrib.opt.LazyAdamOptimizer](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/opt/LazyAdamOptimizer) work for you?
